text: Son of a Bad Man is a 1949 American film directed by Ray Taylor starring Lash LaRue and Al "Fuzzy" St. John.SON OF A BAD MAN. (1952, Monthly Film Bulletin, 19, 37. Retrieved from https://search.proquest.com/docview/1305818393 The film was shot at the Iverson Movie Ranch. ==Plot== Lash and Fuzzy investigate the masked bandit El Sombre and an Eastern Syndicate buying up land to illegally charge tolls. ==Cast== *Lash La Rue as Marshal Lash La Rue *Al St. John as Deputy Fuzzy Q. Jones *Jack Ingram as Rocky *Francis McDonald as Joe Christ *Don C. Harvey as Sheriff Ragle *Frank Lackteen as Piute *Edna Holland as Mrs. Burley ==References== ==External links== * Category:1949 films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:1949 Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by Ray Taylor Category:Lippert Pictures films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Son of a Bad Man
